meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>intercept</kanji> trade and <kanji>cut off</kanji> a country from the rest of the world they'll be stuck in a state of <vocabulary>isolation</vocabulary> or if they have some kind of disease like zombie-itus, it's a <vocabulary>quarantine</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
